text:
Hi Emelia! Sorry for not replying for so long, got 0 notifications about your message. Hope you survived the crunch period and everything went well during it! Bet you have some less stressful projects/deadlines now than the ones back in December (at least I hope so!). Would love to know how your typical working day looks like.
Yes, I am due to graduate soon - in a few months now actually - done my final major project pitch already and started doing some tests for it (not really good ones yet as I've been working quite a lot, but I want to finish everything before FMX). The plan is to do the whole project in Houdini (which I am still learning :sweat_smile:) and Nuke but we will see how it turns out.
